attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic {L} Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Magical Flick
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Revival Blessing
attacks.effect: Put a Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Scrap Pickup
attacks.effect: Put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Pulverizing Press
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Horns
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Combat Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hit and Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Salt Coating
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Find a Home
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Stadium card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Rout
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dread Mountain
attacks.effect: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Spit Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Colorful Graffiti
attacks.effect: You may discard as many Basic Energy cards as you like from your hand. This attack does 40 damage for each type of Basic Energy you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Nutritional Iron
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has 3 or more {M} Energy attached, it gets +100 HP.

attacks.name: Shoot Through
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Send Back
attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Gnaw Relentlessly
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon for each of your Maushold in play.

abilities.name: Insta-Flock
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Flamigo, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: United Wings
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile that has the United Wings attack.

attacks.name: Either Face
attacks.effect: Choose a player. That player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.

attacks.name: Dig Away Flash
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. Shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

abilities.name: Exploding Energy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 5 Basic {G} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. If you searched your deck in this way, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Bouquet Magic
abilities.effect: You must discard a Basic {G} Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Covetous Ivy
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Vitality Song
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Voice
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jealously Singe
attacks.effect: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Flame Surge
attacks.effect: Choose up to 3 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic {R} Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Exciting Dance
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spiral Shot
attacks.effect: Put 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.

abilities.name: Shivery Chill
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic {W} Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hail Blade
attacks.effect: You may discard any amount of {W} Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Jumping Press
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Paralyzing Ball
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 {L} Energy from this Pokémon to make your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Profound Knowledge
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Wise Headbutt
attacks.effect: You may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Tail Swap
attacks.effect: Move all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wondrous Shot
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Big Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Pulverizing Press
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scary Fangs
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 10 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Angry Grudge
attacks.effect: Put up to 12 damage counters on this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter you placed in this way.

abilities.name: Cursed Land
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Pokémon in play that have any damage counters on them have no Abilities, except for Pokémon ex.

attacks.name: Land Scoop
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Toxic Wetland
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if a Stadium is in play, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

attacks.name: Needle Bone
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Bronze Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Nosequake
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Covert Flight
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dominating Echo
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Special Energy or Stadium cards from their hand.

abilities.name: Squawk and Seize
abilities.effect: Once during your first turn, you may discard your hand and draw 6 cards. You can't use more than 1 Squawk and Seize Ability during your turn.

attacks.name: Motivate
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Boss's Orders
cards.effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.

cards.name: Clavell
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon with 120 HP or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Dendra
cards.effect: Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. (If you have no other cards in your hand, you can't use this card.)

cards.name: Falkner
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. If you have a Stadium in play, draw 2 more cards.

cards.name: Giacomo
cards.effect: Discard a Special Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Grusha
cards.effect: Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If none of your Pokémon have any Energy attached, draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand instead.

cards.name: Iono
cards.effect: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, each player draws a card for each of their remaining Prize cards.

cards.name: Saguaro
cards.effect: Choose up to 2 of your Pokémon and heal 50 damage from each of them.

cards.name: Super Rod
cards.effect: Shuffle up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon and Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Superior Energy Retrieval
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.
Put up to 4 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't choose a card you discarded with the effect of this card.)
